nodes.text: The Dandelo system was a star system located in the Tammuz sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Dandelo, the homeworld of the sentient Fuzzum species.

The Dandelo system first appeared, albeit unidentified, in "Coby and the Starhunters," the ninth episode of the animated series Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO, which originally aired on November 2, 1985. It was later identified in The Essential Atlas Online Companion, which placed the system in grid square T-14.
